PSCT.Vegas:
2 Level 4 monsters
① Once per turn: You can detach 1 Material from this card, 
then target 1 face-up monster your opponent controls with ATK less than or equal to this card's; 
send it to the GY, and if you do, inflict 1000 damage to your opponent. 
(This card can't attack the turn you activate this effect).
